column4: hi i mounted a smb share and cyrillic letters are showing up as ??? and i cant even enter the directory any ideas how to fix this?
are you sure you can't enter the directory? Are you doing this from the commandline? Try using "cd " and then hitting tab repeatedly to get the dirname completed
just "cd " and then hit tab repeatedly to cycle through dirs
simply typing out the question marks won't necessarily work
I use utf8 throughout and afaict nonascii dirnames work. If you're not using utf-8 on both ends it gets convoluted.
